name: AdSide
tag_list: advertising, text-based-advertising, on-line-advertising, ad-network, performance-advertising, contextual-advertising, premium-content-network, content-targeting
description: Premium Pay Per Click Ad Network
overview:
AdSide is a premium pay-per-click ad network serving tier-1 content publishers, advertisers and media agencies. It offers a better, simpler platform that delivers highly-targeted text ads within a controlled environment of quality content sites.

AdSide advances the popular contextual and placement-targeting models into an efficient content-targeted network that enables advertisers to easily reach their audiences, beyond what is accessible through traditional keyword targeting.

AdSide’s Two-Step Clickâ„¢ model gauges pre-click user interest, to ensure that advertisers pay only for leads that are likelier to convert, and only from pre-screened, high-performing sites. Our advertisers leverage a powerful combination of twice qualified leads, premium sources of traffic, flexible targeting, and ad placement control - at optimal price points. Our publishers benefit from a platform that blends high advertiser quality with a yield optimizing technology â€“ allowing them to optimize revenue and maintain the user experience intact, at the same time.

milestones.description: AdSide Selected as AlwaysOn East Top 100 Winner
